ch0656_00_ibu/0101_0701_02_10:
Are you about to head out? Eevee wants to
tag along!
ch0656_00_ibu/7101_0701_01_10:
Poké Kids like to pretend to be all kinds
of Pokémon!
ch0656_00_ibu/7101_0701_02_10:
When I grow up, I wanna pretend to be an even
bigger Pokémon!
ch0656_00_ibu/7105_0701_01_10:
What do you wanna be when you grow up,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0656_00_ibu/7105_0701_03_10: A super stylish Sylveon would be amazing, too!
ch0656_00_ibu/7105_0701_04_10: If I try really hard, can I become all of them?
ch0656_00_ibu/1701_0701_01_10: Oh? Looks like Eevee has a present for you!
ch0656_00_ibu/1701_0702_01_10:
OK, now I say, “Let’s go!” and look for
presents again!
ch0656_00_ibu/2501_0701_01_10: My costume is the best thing ever!
ch0656_00_ibu/2501_0701_02_10: Do you want one? Well, you can’t actually buy it.
ch0656_00_ibu/2501_0702_01_10: My mom and dad made this costume for me.
ch0656_00_ibu/2501_0702_02_10: They were both Poké Kids a long time ago, too!
ch0656_00_ibu/2501_0702_03_10:
But they won’t ever tell me what Pokémon
they were.
ch0656_00_ibu/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! I like to do some Synthesis bright and
early, just like a Grass-type Pokémon!
ch0656_00_ibu/3003_0701_01_10:
The Pokémon are getting lively, so now’s a great
time to pretend to be one!
ch0656_00_ibu/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m gonna fall asleep reading my observation
notes again tonight...
